<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scalding Spit](/Feats.aspx?ID=1010) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Torch Goblin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1005)

</column>

---

Your bodily fluids burn with surprising volatility, as if you ran on oil instead of blood. As long as you are taking [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), you gain a boiling spit ranged unarmed attack with a range of 30 feet that deals 1d6 fire damage.
name: Scalding Spit
